entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The governing body of the wizarding world.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: A person who may not have committed a crime.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Foul creatures that feed on human happiness.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A prison for wizards and witches.

entities.name: doris purkiss
entities.description: A person who claims to have new evidence about Sirius Black.

entities.name: little norton
entities.description: A town where Doris Purkiss lives.

relationships.description: The Ministry of Magic has targeted Sirius Black for capture.
Dementors feed on human happiness, which Sirius Black may have.
Sirius Black is a prisoner in Azkaban.
Doris Purkiss has new evidence about Sirius Black.
18 Acanthia Way is the residence of Doris Purkiss.
Little Norton is the location where Doris Purkiss lives.
